title: TURN
summary: TURN (Traversal Using Relays around NAT) is a protocol enabling a computer to receive and send data from behind a Network Address Translator (NAT) or firewall. TURN is used by WebRTC to allow any two devices on the Internet to enter a peer-to-peer connection.
